Nintendo Switch - GAME PRICES


LAUNCHING June 5th 


Console -

1080p, 120Hz 7.9-inch LCD screen with HDR support

The dock can output 4k 

256GB storage

Magnetic joy cons

Built in mic - creative game chat features - C button does all of this - new hub with chat features, screen sharing, and more.


Pirce - $450


$90 for another pair of joy cons

Switch Online 


Mario Kart World - $50 in a bundle as a digital copy, but $80 on its own.


Upgraded switch 2 games - Tears of the Kingdom, Kirby and the forgotten land $80 - yes really

Donkey Kong is $70 apparently 


Third party games seem to have normal prices
